content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 4, Hull City 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 4, Hull City 0.
Foul by Jon Toral (Hull City).
Gary Cahill (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Willian (Chelsea) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Callum Hudson-Odoi.
Substitution, Hull City. Daniel Batty replaces Jackson Irvine.
Foul by Kevin Stewart (Hull City).
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Jackson Irvine (Hull City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Jackson Irvine (Hull City).
Callum Hudson-Odoi (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Kevin Stewart (Hull City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Álvaro Morata (Chelsea).
Attempt missed. Adama Diomande (Hull City) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Jon Toral.
Kyle Scott (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Kyle Scott (Chelsea).
Adama Diomande (Hull City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Jon Toral (Hull City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by David Marshall.
Attempt saved. Daniel Drinkwater (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Jackson Irvine.
Attempt missed. Gary Cahill (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Willian with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Max Clark.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Jon Toral.

Substitution, Chelsea. Álvaro Morata replaces Olivier Giroud.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by David Marshall.
Attempt saved. Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Willian.
Attempt blocked. Willian (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Davide Zappacosta.
Attempt blocked. Michael Dawson (Hull City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jon Toral with a cross.
Corner,  Hull City. Conceded by Willy Caballero.
Attempt saved. Nouha Dicko (Hull City) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Evandro.

Foul by Adama Diomande (Hull City).
Ethan Ampadu (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Hull City. Conceded by Ethan Ampadu.
Substitution, Hull City. Jon Toral replaces Harry Wilson because of an injury.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Max Clark.
Attempt saved. Jackson Irvine (Hull City) header from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Penalty saved! David Meyler (Hull City) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Harry Wilson (Hull City) because of an injury.
Penalty Hull City. Harry Wilson draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea) after a foul in the penalty area.

Substitution, Chelsea. Callum Hudson-Odoi replaces Pedro.
Second Half begins Chelsea 4, Hull City 0.
First Half ends, Chelsea 4, Hull City 0.
Offside, Hull City. Nouha Dicko tries a through ball, but Evandro is caught offside.
Foul by Gary Cahill (Chelsea).
Evandro (Hull City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Chelsea 4, Hull City 0. Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Emerson.
